meaningMnemonic: All <kanji>forms</kanji> of <kanji>tolerance</kanji> are still <vocabulary>tolerance</vocabulary>. Usually people like this are really <vocabulary>open minded</vocabulary> and <vocabulary>generous</vocabulary> too.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
